data.lyric:
[ti:KillShot (MGK Diss) (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem]
[al:Killshot (MGK Diss) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]KillShot (Explicit) - Eminem (埃米纳姆)
[00:00.52]You sound like a b***h b***h
[00:02.15]Shut the f**k up
[00:03.14]When your fans become your haters
[00:04.58]You done
[00:05.35]F**kin' beard's weird
[00:06.29]All right
[00:06.57]You yellin' at the mic you weird beard
[00:07.91]We doin' this once
[00:08.57]You yellin' at the mic your beard's weird
[00:09.95]Why you yellin' at the mic Illa
[00:11.60]Rihanna just hit me on the text
[00:13.66]Last night I left hickeys on her neck
[00:15.94]Wait you just dissed me I'm perplexed
[00:17.75]Insult me in a line compliment me on the next
[00:19.88]D**n I'm really sorry you want me to have a heart attack
[00:22.93]Was watchin' 8 Mile on my NordicTrack
[00:24.93]Realized I forgot to call you back
[00:26.59]Here's that autograph for your daughter
[00:28.08]I wrote it on a Starter cap
[00:30.28]Stan Stan son
[00:31.67]Listen man Dad isn't mad
[00:33.69]But how you gonna name yourself after a d**n gun
[00:37.10]And have a man-bun
[00:39.37]The giant's woke eyes open undeniable
[00:41.22]Supplyin' smoke got the fire stoked
[00:43.00]Say you got me in a scope but you grazed me
[00:45.23]I say one call to Interscope and you're Swayze
[00:47.57]Your reply got the crowd yelling woo
[00:49.38]So before you die let's see who can out-petty who
[00:51.48]With your corny lines "Slim you're old" ow Kelly ooh
[00:53.81]But I'm 45 and I'm still outselling you
[00:56.27]By 29 I had three albums that had blew
[00:58.67]Now let's talk about somethin' I don't really do
[01:00.51]Go in someone's daughter's mouth stealin' food
[01:02.54]But you're a f**kin' mole hill
[01:03.71]Now I'ma make a mountain out of you woo
[01:05.78]Ho chill actin' like you put the chrome barrel to my bone marrow
[01:08.54]Gunner b***h you ain't a bow and arrow
[01:09.83]Say you'll run up on me like a phone bill sprayin' lead brrt
[01:12.49]Playin' dead that's the only time you hold still hold up
[01:15.01]Are you eating cereal or oatmeal
[01:17.15]What the f**k's in the bowl milk Wheaties or Cheerios
[01:19.60]'Cause I'm takin' a s**t in 'em Kelly I need reading material
[01:22.20]Dictionary
[01:23.08]Yo slim your last four albums sucked
[01:25.13]Go back to Recovery
[01:26.11]Oh shoot that was three albums ago
[01:28.19]What do you know oops
[01:29.15]Know your facts before you come at me lil' goof
[01:31.47]Luxury oh you broke b***h yeah I had enough money in '02
[01:34.66]To burn it in front of you ho
[01:35.98]Younger me no you're the wack me it's funny but so true
[01:38.86]I'd rather be 80-year-old me than 20-year-old you
[01:42.60]'Til I'm hitting old age
[01:43.84]Still can fill a whole page with a 10-year-old's rage
[01:45.95]Got more fans than you in your own city lil' kiddy go play
[01:48.87]Feel like I'm babysitting Lil Tay
[01:50.54]Got the Diddy okay so you spent your whole day
[01:52.77]Shootin' a video just to f**kin' dig your own grave
[01:54.92]Got you at your own wake I'm the billy goat
[01:57.03]You ain't never made a list next to no Biggie no Jay
[01:59.56]Next to Taylor Swift and that Iggy ho you about to really blow
[02:02.55]Kelly they'll be putting your name
[02:04.08]Next to Ja next to Benzino die motherf**ker
[02:06.26]Like the last motherf**ker sayin' Hailie in vain
[02:08.57]Alien brain you Satanist yeah
[02:11.38]My biggest flops are your greatest hits
[02:13.20]The game's mine again and ain't nothin' changed but the locks
[02:15.35]So before I slay this b***h I mwah give Jade a kiss
[02:18.89]Gotta wake up Labor Day to this the f**k
[02:21.18]Bein' rich-shamed by some prick usin' my name for clickbait
[02:24.05]In a state of bliss 'cause I said his godd**n name
[02:26.22]Now I gotta cock back aim
[02:27.52]Yeah b***h pop Champagne to this pop
[02:30.26]It's your moment
[02:31.23]This is it as big as you're gonna get so enjoy it
[02:34.25]Had to give you a career to destroy it
[02:36.19]Lethal injection
[02:36.92]Go to sleep six feet deep I'll give you a B for the effort
[02:39.70]But if I was three-foot-eleven
[02:41.11]You'd look up to me and for the record
[02:42.62]You would suck a d**k to f**kin' be me for a second
[02:45.51]Lick a ballsack to get on my channel
[02:47.30]Give your life to be as solidified
[02:49.16]This mothaf**kin' s**t is like Rambo when he's out of bullets
[02:51.40]So what good is a f**kin' machine gun when it's out of ammo
[02:54.31]Had enough of this tatted-up mumble rapper
[02:55.90]How the f**k can him and I battle
[02:57.57]He'll have to f**k Kim in my flannel
[02:59.26]I'll give him my sandals
[03:00.20]'Cause he knows long as I'm Shady he's gon' have to live in my shadow
[03:03.46]Exhausting letting off on my offspring
[03:05.65]Like a gun barrel b***h get off me
[03:07.24]You dance around it like a sombrero we can all see
[03:09.48]You're f**kin' salty
[03:10.00]'Cause Young Gerald's balls-deep inside of Halsey
[03:13.46]Your red sweater your black leather
[03:15.71]You dress better I rap better
[03:17.85]That a death threat or a love letter
[03:20.18]Little white toothpick
[03:21.00]Thinks it's over a pic I just don't like you prick
[03:23.44]Thanks for dissing me
[03:24.65]Now I had an excuse on the mic to write "Not Alike"
[03:27.01]But really I don't care who's in the right
[03:28.83]But you're losin' the fight you picked
[03:31.66]Who else want it Kells
[03:33.37]Attempt fails Budden L's
[03:35.64]F**kin' nails in these coffins as soft as Cottonelle
[03:38.95]Killshot I will not fail I'm with the Doc still
[03:41.23]But this idiot's boss pops pills and tells him he's got skills
[03:44.04]But Kells the day you put out a hit's the day Diddy admits
[03:46.86]That he put the hit out that got Pac kill ah
[03:49.19]I'm sick of you bein' wack
[03:50.29]And still usin' that mothaf**kin' Auto-Tune
[03:52.36]So let's talk about it let's talk about it
[03:53.87]I'm sick of your mumble rap mouth
[03:55.03]Need to get the cock up out it
[03:56.33]Before we can even talk about it talk about it
[03:58.26]I'm sick of your blonde hair and earrings
[03:59.97]Just 'cause you look in the mirror and think
[04:01.50]That you're Marshall Mathers Marshall Mathers
[04:03.00]Don't mean you are and you're not about it
[04:04.56]So just leave my d**k in your mouth and keep my daughter out it
[04:07.17]You f**kin' oh
[04:09.61]And I'm just playin' Diddy
[04:10.90]You know I love you
data.trans:
[ti:KillShot (MGK Diss) (Explicit)]
[ar:Eminem]
[al:Killshot (MGK Diss) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.52]你说话就像个娘炮
[00:02.15]快闭嘴吧
[00:03.14]所有人都要粉转黑了
[00:04.58]你唠叨完了吗
[00:05.35]你的胡子也太奇怪了吧
[00:06.29]好吧
[00:06.57]怪胡子男人 别朝麦吼了
[00:07.91]我们就一次解决恩怨
[00:08.57]为什么要朝着麦克风吼来吼去呢 怪胡子
[00:09.95]为什么要朝着麦克风吼呢
[00:11.60]蕾哈娜刚给我发了短信
[00:13.66]昨晚我在她脖子上种了草莓
[00:15.94]等等 你diss我了 我真有点摸不着头脑
[00:17.75]上一行词还在骂我 下一行词又开始夸我
[00:19.88]这起起伏伏 你是不是想让我心脏病发作啊
[00:22.93]我刚刚在跑步机上看八英里
[00:24.93]突然想到我好像忘了回应你
[00:26.59]这是送你女儿的签名
[00:28.08]我已经签在棒球帽上了
[00:30.28]你也是个Stan啊 崽子
[00:31.67]听好了 你爹我可没疯
[00:33.69]但是你怎么能给自己起个枪的名字
[00:37.10]还梳着个丸子头
[00:39.37]巨人被你吵醒 睁开双眼 你无法阻挡我前进的势头
[00:41.22]哥的嘴巴就是喷火药的
[00:43.00]你说早就锁定我了 但子弹还是和我擦身而过
[00:45.23]我说我要给Interscope打个电话 你就遁地开溜
[00:47.57]你的Diss反响还不错
[00:49.38]但在你死前 我倒要看看谁能灭了谁
[00:51.48]说着那些俗的不行的话 Slim你太老了 哦 Kelly 噢
[00:53.81]我都45了 卖的唱片都还比你多
[00:56.27]我29岁的时候都出了三张冠专了
[00:58.67]不如说说我没干过的事吧
[01:00.51]我可不用别人的女儿来蹭热度
[01:02.54]但你只是害群之马罢了
[01:03.71]我就是要小题大做 帮你一把
[01:05.78]冷静点兄弟 别老想在我背后开黑枪
[01:08.54]还枪 你连弓箭都不如
[01:09.83]还说你要来报复我 疯狂扫射
[01:12.49]劝你装死吧 这是你唯一一次能稳住的机会了
[01:15.01]你吃燕麦 泡牛奶还是水
[01:17.15]碗里装的是啥 牛奶吗 加了燕麦还是芝士条
[01:19.60]因为我要在这里头拉个大号 我得找点厕所读物
[01:22.20]干脆就读读字典吧
[01:23.08]嘿Slim 你上四张专辑都太差了
[01:25.13]回到Recovery那巅峰时期吧
[01:26.11]我的天 那是三张专辑之前啊
[01:28.19]你到底知道什么啊
[01:29.15]Diss我之前先了解下事实吧 小**
[01:31.47]谈谈奢侈品 哦 你破产了吗 我02年就挣够了钱
[01:34.66]钱多得能在你面前烧一烧
[01:35.98]你是年轻版的我？不 你是菜鸟版的我 这真是有趣
[01:38.86]我宁可老到80岁 也不愿意变成20岁的你
[01:42.60]就算我老了
[01:43.84]我也能写出一整页 年轻气盛时的那种暴怒歌词
[01:45.95]在你自己家乡 我粉丝都比你多 小屁孩一边玩去吧
[01:48.87]我难道还真要跟你和Lil Tay过家家吗
[01:50.54]Diddy点头同意 所以你就花了一整天
[01:52.77]拍了个MV 记录下给自己挖坟的过程
[01:54.92]在你自己守夜典上抓住你 我就是史上最佳
[01:57.03]你根本不能与Biggie和Jay-Z相提并论
[01:59.56]连泰勒斯威夫特和Iggy都比不上
[02:02.55]你的名字将会
[02:04.08]与Ja Rule和Benzino这样失败的人一同出现 去死吧
[02:06.26]和之前那几个提到Hailie的一起下地狱吧
[02:08.57]你个撒旦教徒可真是思路清奇
[02:11.38]我最失败的专辑比你最成功的专辑都强
[02:13.20]说唱游戏再次由我掌控 除了我的发色之外一如既往
[02:15.35]所以在我秒杀全场之前 先亲亲Hailie
[02:18.89]劳动节一睁眼就发生这破事
[02:21.18]有了钱 但总有些人 用我名字蹭热度
[02:24.05]我提到他的名字 他就开心的不行
[02:26.22]现在我要开火反击 瞄准
[02:27.52]开香槟庆祝啊
[02:30.26]你的巅峰时刻
[02:31.23]此时此刻 这就是你应得的 多享受一下
[02:34.25]总得让你火一把再灭了你
[02:36.19]注射死亡
[02:36.92]安详睡去吧 送你入土 你的努力我给你打个B级
[02:39.70]但就算我只有三尺二
[02:41.11]你还是得仰望我 准确说
[02:42.62]如果能让你当一秒的我 你都得立马跪舔我
[02:45.51]想上我的电台 都得好好服侍我
[02:47.30]放你条生路 你非要活在人们心中
[02:49.16]你就像没了枪的兰博
[02:51.40]没子弹了 那还叫什么机枪
[02:54.31]他和mumble rapper没什么差别
[02:55.90]我和他怎么battle一场？
[02:57.57]就是他上了Kim 也得穿着我的裤子
[02:59.26]我拖鞋也一起借给他算了
[03:00.20]只要我还是Shady 我的阴影就会永远笼罩他
[03:03.46]真是受够了 肆意喷射我的后代
[03:05.65]如同枪管喷火 你们有多远滚多远吧
[03:07.24]蹦蹦跳跳像在跳舞 我们都看的出来
[03:09.48]你是不是超级不爽
[03:10.00]因为G-Eazy和猴西又在一起了
[03:13.46]小红毛衣 黑皮夹克
[03:15.71]你穿的好 我唱的好
[03:17.85]你给我下的是死亡威胁 还是小情书
[03:20.18]瘦的像根白牙签
[03:21.00]我看了你一张照片实在不喜欢你这个刺头
[03:23.44]谢谢你来diss我
[03:24.65]我终于有理由写下Not Alike了
[03:27.01]其实我压根不在意谁是正义一方
[03:28.83]但是你挑起来的战争你自己失败
[03:31.66]下一个是谁？MGK？挑战失败
[03:33.37]至于Budden？那可是彻底的失败
[03:35.64]你那些压倒我的稻草轻如无物
[03:38.95]一枪必杀 我不会失手 毕竟我还和德瑞博士一起混
[03:41.23]但这傻老板嗑嗨了 说他有点水平？
[03:44.04]但等你做出热单那天
[03:46.86]Diddy都会承认是自己**了2Pac
[03:49.19]我真是受够了你这个菜鸟
[03:50.29]还用那破Autotune
[03:52.36]咱们说说这事
[03:53.87]受够了你唱mumble rap的那张嘴
[03:55.03]需要往你嘴巴里塞点东西堵上
[03:56.33]咱们说说这事
[03:58.26]我真是受够了你的金发和耳环
[03:59.97]照照镜子
[04:01.50]觉得你就是我
[04:03.00]我可没说你是 你不配
[04:04.56]你还是接着跪舔吧 离我女儿远点
[04:07.17]你这个 哦
[04:09.61]我只是玩玩哦 Diddy
[04:10.90]你知道我爱你的
